name: Stinky Sewers
description:
Welcome to the killing floor for poor!
This game is about a hobo living in the sewers. He is being attacked by the dead, wanting to claim these sewers as their home.
Clear 5 waves of zombies, and a special boss wave in the end. Watch the amount of ammo you have (new packs are spawned with each wave). 
Don't stop, don't let them surround you (also fat ones are explosive so be far from them when they die).

This one is sort of a part of a "challenge" that I made up for myself on a journey of exploring all kinds of different engines.
This is a Game Guru game, but wait! I did retexturing of stuff, a bit of remodeling, some scripting with the help of the examples I could find on the forums, added music, styled ui a bit, changed standard menu/win/death screens, altered all kinds of different stuff that I considered annoying (like red screen, heartbeat sound on any scratch received, amount of lives shown in hud when you only have one anyway), etc. So I put some effort into this game actually, not just slapped assets on the map in random places. And I really hope this doesn't look like generic Game Guru stuff that floods the Steam. This doesn't mean this one is good, it's just hopefully not as bad.

Bugs that I know about:
Rarely the game will close itself right after the actual gameplay starts, not often, just reopen it again - it can happen once in a hundred times, it can happen twice in a row. I wish I could give more professional commentary - but it's just Game Guru for ya. 
Also the music volume option doesn't work, so enjoy this raw 8-string guitar recording.
